channel.title: Sunscreen on SciBook: analysis of published information about vaccinations and infections
channel.description: Recent content in Sunscreen on SciBook: analysis of published information about vaccinations and infections

item.title: Aluminum: a potential pro-oxidant in sunscreens/sunblocks?
item.description: Aluminum is found in large quantities in sunscreens. Since aluminum is an oxidant, it is highly likely that it contributes to the development of melanoma.
